title: Chainlink co-founder says Bitcoin ETFs will fuel mass institutional adoption
description:
Chainlink co-founder Sergey Nazarov believes a spot Bitcoin ETF will create a path for institutions to buy Bitcoin en masse, eventually leading to more blockchain products and services. Nazarov shared his insights during a recent interview with CNBC, discussing the transformative potential of blockchain technology in the traditional finance (TradFi) sector. Nazarov’s perspective comes at […]

The post Chainlink co-founder says Bitcoin ETFs will fuel mass institutional adoption appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ghostwire Tokyo Available for Free on Epic Games Store for 24 Hours
